account

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • account.Account
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Contact> contacts
      A ArrayList used to store Contact objects.

      The inbox server used by the Account.

      A ArrayList used to store Mail objects.
      private java.lang.String name
      A name to identifiy the Account for example 'Eriks Mails' or 'erik.heinisch@aol.de'
      private OutboxServer outboxServer
      The outbox server used by the Account

    • Constructor Detail

      • Account

        public Account(java.lang.String p_accName,
       java.lang.String p_inboxServer,
       int p_inboxServerPort,
       java.lang.String p_outboxServer,
       int p_outboxServerPort)
        Constructs a new Account using the given parameter to initialize all needed informations.
        Parameters:
        p_accName - A name to identifiy the Account for example 'Eriks Mails' or 'erik.heinisch@aol.de'
        p_inboxServer - The url used by the InboxServer of the Account.
        p_inboxServerPort - The port used by the InboxServer.
        p_outboxServer - The url used by the OutboxServer of the Account
        p_outboxServerPort - The port used by the OutboxServer.

              java.lang.String value)

        Parameters:

        p_setting - The property to modify.help.txt
        value - The new value to set. help.txt

      • mail_id_used

        public boolean mail_id_used(int mail_id)
        Checks if an id is in use to identify a Mail at the moment.
        Parameters:
        mail_id - The id to check for.
        Returns:
        returns false if the id is used, true if the id is NOT used. It is this way around, because this method is mostly used to determinate if you can use an id, so true means you are free to use it.

      • contact_id_used

        public boolean contact_id_used(int contact_id)
        Checks if an id is in use to identify a Contact at the moment.
        Parameters:
        contact_id - The id to check for.
        Returns:
        returns false if the id is used, true if the id is NOT used. It is this way around, because this method is mostly used to determinate if you can use an id, so true means you are free to use it.

      • get

        public java.lang.Object get(java.lang.String p_ArgumentToGet)
        Returns a property of this Account.
        Parameters:
        p_ArgumentToGet - The property to get.
        Returns:
        The requested property, most times a String but not always. It is also possible to get an Integer.

        public void set(java.lang.String p_ArgumentToChange,
       java.lang.String p_ValueToSet)
        Sets a new value to a property of this Account.
        Parameters:
        p_ArgumentToChange - The property to change. help.txt
        p_ValueToSet - The new Property.
